body_html: @cpuhrsch or @yf225 was it you that noticed that on Windows, our implementation of optional isn't always understood correctly by MSVC? We are pretty sure MSVC (or maybe MSVC + CUDA?) has a compiler bug that causes it to not handle optional correctly in some cases.
body_text: @cpuhrsch or @yf225  was it you that noticed that on Windows, our implementation of optional isn't always understood correctly by MSVC? We are pretty sure MSVC (or maybe MSVC + CUDA?) has a compiler bug that causes it to not handle optional correctly in some cases.
body: @cpuhrsch or @yf225  was it you that noticed that on Windows, our implementation of `optional` isn't always understood correctly by MSVC? We are pretty sure MSVC (or maybe MSVC + CUDA?) has a compiler bug that causes it to not handle optional correctly in some cases.
